ingame_hotkeys:
local idz = {10718, 10732} -- adicionar ID dos itens
macro(100, "Coletar itens do chão", function()
local z = posz()
for _, tile in ipairs(g_map.getTiles(z)) do
    if z ~= posz() then return end
        if getDistanceBetween(pos(), tile:getPosition()) <= 10 then -- distância que quer coletar
            if table.find(idz, tile:getTopLookThing():getId()) then
                g_game.move(tile:getTopLookThing(), {x = 65535, y=SlotBack, z=0}, tile:getTopLookThing():getCount())
            end
        end
    end
end)



--[[Esconder Nomes Laranjas da tela]]--
TH = macro(100, "esconder msg laranja", function() end)
onStaticText(function(thing, text)
    if TH.isOff() then return end
    if not text:find('says:') then
        g_map.cleanTexts()
    end
end)


macro(1, 'virar target', function()
 if not g_game.isAttacking() then return end
 local tt = g_game.getAttackingCreature()
 local tx = tt:getPosition().x
 local ty = tt:getPosition().y
 local dir = player:getDirection()
 local tdx = math.abs(tx-pos().x)
 local tdy = math.abs(ty-pos().y)
 if (tdy >= 2 and tdx >= 2) or tdx > 7 or tdy > 7 then return end 
 if tdy >= tdx then
  if ty > pos().y then
   if dir ~= 2 then
    return turn(2)
   end
  else
   if dir ~= 0 then
    return turn(0)
   end
  end
 else
  if tx > pos().x then
   if dir ~= 1 then
    return turn(1)
   end
  else
   if dir ~= 3 then
    return turn(3)
   end
  end
 end
end)

local healingSpell = 'otsutsuki regeneration'
local hpPercent = 99
macro(50, "faster healing",  function()
  if (hppercent() <= hpPercent) then
    say(healingSpell) 
  end
end)



local dash, distancia = false, 2
addIcon("SetOnOff", {item={id=10765, count=1}, switchable=true}, function(widget, enabled)
  if enabled then dash = true else dash = false end
end)

addIcon("SetDistance", {text="Dist = "..distancia, switchable=true}, function(widget, enabled)
  distancia = (distancia == 7 and 2 or distancia + 1)
  info(distancia)
end)

onKeyPress(function(keys)
    local c = {
        ['W'] = {0, -5}, ['D'] = {5, 0}, ['S'] = {0, 5}, ['A'] = {-5, 0},
        ['Up'] = {0, -5}, ['Right'] = {5, 0}, ['Down'] = {0, 5}, ['Left'] = {-5, 0},
    }
    if dash and c[keys] ~= nil then
        local posJogador = player:getPosition()
        posJogador.x = posJogador.x + c[keys][1]
        posJogador.y = posJogador.y + c[keys][2]
        local verificarPiso = g_map.getTile(posJogador)
        if verificarPiso then
            local usarDash = verificarPiso:getTopUseThing()
            if usarDash then
                g_game.use(usarDash)
            end
        end
    end
end)
UI.Separator()

end)
macro(3000, "Buff 2 Macro", function()
  say("Susanoo Kagutsuchi")
end)

local chakradown1 = 'Chakra rest' -- nome da magia
local manaPercent = 95-- porcentagem de mana
macro(2000, "Chakra rest 95", function()
if (manapercent() <= manaPercent) then 
    say(chakradown1) 
 end 
end)

Follow = macro(1000,"Follow",function()

nome = storage.followLeader
end)

UI.Label("Follow Player:")
addTextEdit("playerToFollow", storage.followLeader or "Heeey", function(widget, text)
    storage.followLeader = text
    target = tostring(text)
end)

nome = storage.followLeader
pos_p = player:getPosition()

p = getCreatureByName(nome)

onCreaturePositionChange(function(creature, newPos, oldPos)
    if Follow.isOn() then
    
        if creature:getName()==player:getName() and getCreatureByName(nome) == nil and newPos.z>oldPos.z then
        
            say('skip')
            for i = -1,1 do
              for j = -1,1 do
            
                local useTile = g_map.getTile({x=posx()+i,y=posy()+j,z=posz()})
                 g_game.use(useTile:getTopUseThing())
                
            
              end
            end
        end
        if creature:getName()==nome then
          
            
            if newPos==nil then
                
                
                lastPos = oldPos
                
                schedule(200,function()
                 autoWalk(oldPos)
                end)
                
                schedule(1000,function()
                    for i = -1,1 do
                      for j = -1,1 do
                    
                        local useTile = g_map.getTile({x=posx()+i,y=posy()+j,z=posz()})
                        g_game.use(useTile:getTopUseThing())
                        
                    
                      end
                    end
                end)
            
            
            end
            
            if oldPos.z == newPos.z then
                     
                schedule(300,function()
                 local useTile = g_map.getTile({x=oldPos.x,y=oldPos.y,z=oldPos.z})
                 topThing = useTile:getTopThing()
                 
                 if not useTile:isWalkable() then
                   use(topThing)
                 end
                
                end)
            
            
                autoWalk({x=oldPos.x,y=oldPos.y,z=oldPos.z})
            else
            
                lastPos = oldPos
                autoWalk(oldPos)
                for i = 1,6 do
                    schedule(i*200,function()
                      autoWalk(oldPos)
                    
                      if getDistanceBetween(pos(), oldPos) == 0 and (posz()>newPos.z and getCreatureByName(nome) == nil) then
                        say('skip')
                      end
                    end)
                end
                local useTile = g_map.getTile({x=newPos.x,y=newPos.y-1,z=oldPos.z})
                 g_game.use(useTile:getTopUseThing())
                            
            
            end
          
        
        end
    
    end
end)
